Class SimpleController

java.lang.Object
SimpleController
public class SimpleController extends Object
A simple controller class responsible for managing students, courses, and enrollments. This class handles data loading from and saving to CSV files, and provides methods for student-course registration and lookup.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimpleController

      public SimpleController() throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructs a new SimpleController, loading students, courses, and enrollments from file.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if one of the files cannot be found

  • Method Details

    • loadStudents

      public void loadStudents() throws FileNotFoundException
      Loads student data from the students.csv file.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be opened

    • loadCourses

      public void loadCourses() throws FileNotFoundException
      Loads course data from the courses.csv file and sorts the course list.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be opened

    • loadEnrollments

      public void loadEnrollments() throws FileNotFoundException
      Loads enrollment data from the enrollments.csv file.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be opened

    • lookupStudent

      public Student lookupStudent(String studentID)
      Finds and returns a student based on ID.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student
      Returns:
      the Student object if found; otherwise, null

    • lookupCourse

      public Course lookupCourse(String courseCode)
      Finds and returns a course based on code.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - the code of the course
      Returns:
      the Course object if found; otherwise, null

    • registerStudentToCourse

      public void registerStudentToCourse(String student, String code)
      Registers a student to a course using student ID and course code.
      Parameters:
      student - the student ID
      code - the course code

    • addNewCourse

      public void addNewCourse(String code, String title, String credit)
      Adds a new course to the course list.
      Parameters:
      code - the course code
      title - the course title
      credit - the credit value of the course

    • saveStudentsAndEnrollments

      public void saveStudentsAndEnrollments() throws FileNotFoundException
      Saves students and their enrollments to their respective CSV files.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if files cannot be written

    • saveCourses

      public void saveCourses() throws FileNotFoundException
      Saves all course information to the courses.csv file.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be written

    • saveData

      public boolean saveData()
      Saves all data to CSV and JSON files.
      Returns:
      true if all data was saved successfully; false otherwise

    • addNewStudent

      public void addNewStudent(String studentID, String name, String status, String thesisTopic, String yearLevel)
      Adds a new student to the system.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student
      name - the name of the student
      status - "Graduate" or "Undergraduate"
      thesisTopic - thesis topic (for graduates)
      yearLevel - year level (for undergraduates)
